name: .WKT File Extension
summary: Learn about .WKT files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a WKT file with QGIS (multiplatform) or Wicket (Web) to view the geometry it describes. You can also open a WKT file with Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac) or any other text editor to view the plain text data it contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
